data.lyric:
[ti:Circles]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Circles - Post Malone
[00:00.94]Lyrics by：Louis Bell/Austin Post/Adam Feeney/Billy Walsh/Kaan Gunesberk
[00:01.88]Composed by：Louis Bell/Austin Post/Adam Feeney/Billy Walsh/Kaan Gunesberk
[00:02.82]Oh oh oh-oh
[00:06.94]Oh oh oh-oh
[00:10.81]Oh oh oh-oh
[00:13.00]Oh-oh oh-oh
[00:18.86]Oh oh oh-oh
[00:22.83]Oh oh oh-oh
[00:26.77]Oh oh oh-oh
[00:28.78]Oh-oh oh-oh
[00:34.59]We couldn't turn around
[00:38.50]'Til we were upside down
[00:42.57]I'll be the bad guy now
[00:46.59]But know I ain't too proud
[00:50.46]I couldn't be there
[00:54.71]Even when I tried
[00:58.41]You don't believe it
[01:02.59]We do this every time
[01:04.59]Seasons change and our love went cold
[01:08.66]Feed the flame 'cause we can't let go
[01:12.76]Run away but we're running in circles
[01:16.58]Run away run away
[01:19.25]I dare you to do something
[01:23.06]I'm waiting on you again
[01:26.45]So I don't take the blame
[01:28.92]Run away but we're running in circles
[01:32.74]Run away run away run away
[01:36.29]Let go
[01:38.57]I got a feeling that it's time to let go
[01:44.09]I said so
[01:46.55]I knew that this was doomed from the get-go
[01:50.99]You thought that it was special special
[01:55.04]But it was just the s*x though the s*x though
[01:58.98]And I still hear the echoes
[02:01.59]The echoes
[02:02.53]I got a feeling that it's time to let it go let it go
[02:08.58]Seasons change and our love went cold
[02:12.75]Feed the flame 'cause we can't let go
[02:16.71]Run away but we're running in circles
[02:20.73]Run away run away
[02:23.12]I dare you to do something
[02:27.03]I'm waiting on you again
[02:30.58]So I don't take the blame
[02:32.79]Run away but we're running in circles
[02:36.73]Run away run away run away
[02:40.76]Maybe you don't understand what I'm going through
[02:44.58]It's only me what you got to lose
[02:48.59]Make up your mind tell me what are you gonna do
[02:52.47]It's only me let it go
[02:56.73]Seasons change and our love went cold
[03:00.73]Feed the flame 'cause we can't let go
[03:04.70]Run away but we're running in circles
[03:08.74]Run away run away
[03:11.15]I dare you to do something
[03:15.04]I'm waiting on you again
[03:18.48]So I don't take the blame
[03:20.67]Run away but we're running in circles
[03:24.76]Run away run away run away
data.trans:
[ti:Circles]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.94]//
[00:01.88]//
[00:02.82]//
[00:06.94]//
[00:10.81]//
[00:13.00]//
[00:18.86]//
[00:22.83]//
[00:26.77]//
[00:28.78]//
[00:34.59]我们已然无力挽回
[00:38.50]除非世界翻天覆地
[00:42.57]如今我成了负心人
[00:46.59]而我并不为此骄傲
[00:50.46]再不会守在你身边
[00:54.71]即使我拼尽全力
[00:58.41]可你并不相信
[01:02.59]剧情总是这样上演
[01:04.59]时过境迁 我们炙热的爱已然冷却
[01:08.66]期盼爱火重燃 因为我们舍不得就此放手
[01:12.76]逃离 却又陷入无止境的循环 
[01:16.58]逃离 逃离
[01:19.25]我谅你也回天乏术
[01:23.06]可我又对你抱有期待
[01:26.45]不该将责任一并推给我
[01:28.92]逃离 却又陷入无止境的循环 
[01:32.74]逃离 逃离
[01:36.29]放手
[01:38.57]我有种预感 是时候放手了
[01:44.09]我是说真的
[01:46.55]从一开始我就知道 注定是这样的结局
[01:50.99]你却不死心 认定这爱情不落俗套
[01:55.04]但这并没有如你所愿 泯然众人而已
[01:58.98]我仍然能听到这回声
[02:01.59]这回声
[02:02.53]我有种预感 是时候放手了
[02:08.58]时过境迁 我们炙热的爱已然冷却
[02:12.75]期盼爱火重燃 因为我们舍不得就此放手
[02:16.71]逃离 却又陷入无止境的循环 
[02:20.73]逃离 逃离
[02:23.12]我谅你也回天乏术
[02:27.03]可我又对你抱有期待
[02:30.58]不该将责任一并推给我
[02:32.79]逃离 却又陷入无止境的循环 
[02:36.73]逃离 逃离
[02:40.76]也许你不懂我经历了什么
[02:44.58]你失去的只不过是微不足道的我
[02:48.59]下定决心 告诉我你的打算
[02:52.47]只是我而已 放手吧
[02:56.73]时过境迁 我们炙热的爱已然冷却
[03:00.73]期盼爱火重燃 因为我们舍不得就此放手
[03:04.70]逃离 却又陷入无止境的循环 
[03:08.74]逃离 逃离
[03:11.15]我谅你也回天乏术
[03:15.04]可我又对你抱有期待
[03:18.48]不该将责任一并推给我
[03:20.67]逃离 却又陷入无止境的循环 
[03:24.76]逃离 逃离
